name: Run & ONE
description:
Run & ONE is a platformer game where the goal is to turn every 0s to 1s.

Rules:
Turn every platform with 0s to a platform with 1 by jumping on them.
When you jump on a platform with 1 you die.

Control:
Press Space to jump
Hold Space for long jump

Created by Soma Györe (https://gysoma.itch.io) and Marcell Mayer (https://joysquid.itch.io/)

The song '16 Cracked' by BEN DRAKE downloaded from https://www.jamendo.com/track/120999/16-cracked
